overview: Did someone call for Daddy's Boy Whore? It's not every day you watch your stepdad in the shower, but today was Timmy's day. He tried being sneaky, but his stepdad, Cris, caught him. Only one thing to do now, and Cris knew just what that was.  It's weird to notice how your services help a young adult boy develop. Harry finished another school year and now had dark brown hair. He came back, and Conor was so happy to see him. He missed touching him a lot. It's part of a dad's job to show their boy how to handle their wood, and John's stepson, Danny, is no exception. When John walked in and saw Danny bent over the pool table trying to hit the balls, his cock started to twitch a little. Teaching Danny about sticks, balls, and holes sounds like fun. After Loick and Andreas finished soccer practice, Andreas slapped Loick on the butt, and asked for a rub. That was just the beginning.
title: Daddy's Boy Whore: Volume 54
